name: N-Snakes
description:
📣N-Snakes It is a remake of the Nokia Snake 3D snake.
For 5 months of Working . Now I Reach this Far .

This game is primarily designed for Nokia N-Gage platforms. And Symbian phones like Nokia N95.
So . I will try Remake this Game to be available on Android and PC soon.

Difficulty remaking this game. It needs to be optimized to run the game at near-full framerate on all Android Devices.

 Game Features :
-Customized snake skins and colors.
-Multiplayer mode.
-Creating levels using level editor.
-Square and Hex Grids , Infinite forward moves , Two Surfaces of the Playfield.

Release Date : 27/01/2021

The game is still in production. Follow us on social media to learn more about the game :
